## Required Validations (for feed changes)

If you're adding or editing a feed, please confirm all the following (mark with [x]):

- [ ] My feed is valid (checked using https://validator.w3.org/feed/)
- [ ] My feed is Python-specific (filtered by tag/category if needed)
- [ ] I only post Python-related content or content interesting for the Python community
- [ ] My feed contains only English language content
- [ ] I understand it may take a few hours for my feed to start being fetched

> **Note:** If you are adding a podcast feed, please validate using http://castfeedvalidator.com/
